amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a framework for closure of the detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, by December 31, 2016.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in Part A of House Report 113-460 to provide a framework for closure of the detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, by December 31, 2016.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 247 (Roll no. 233).
